title: New forests for old
creator_credit: Crawley Films, Council of Forest Industries of British Columbia and Seaton Findlay
brief_description: Reafforestation plays an important role in ensuring a steady supply of raw material for future generations. This film looks at such a scheme applied to the timberlands of British Columbia.
creator_credit_for_label: Crawley Films, Council of Forest Industries of British Columbia and Seaton Findlay
